annotations.description: Application template for a HA persistent authoring environment for decision, for Red Hat Process Automation Manager 7.13 - Deprecated
annotations.openshift.io/display-name: Red Hat Process Automation Manager 7.13 authoring environment (HA, persistent, with https) for decisions.
annotations.template.openshift.io/long-description: This template defines resources needed to develop and execute Rules on Red Hat Process Automation Manager 7.13 with High Availability enabled as tech preview, including application deployment configuration, secure and insecure http communication and persistent volumes to store data that needs to survive a restart. Template for Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform version 3.11. Deprecated since Red Hat Decision Manager version 7.5; consider using the Red Hat Business Automation Operator.

message:
A new persistent HA Process Automation Manager application for Decision has been created in your project.
The username/password needed for accessing the application are stored in "${CREDENTIALS_SECRET}" secret as
KIE_ADMIN_USER and KIE_ADMIN_PWD

You must create the secret named "${CREDENTIALS_SECRET}" containing the KIE_ADMIN_USER and KIE_ADMIN_PWD values and the secrets named "${DECISION_CENTRAL_HTTPS_SECRET}" and "${KIE_SERVER_HTTPS_SECRET}"
containing the ${DECISION_CENTRAL_HTTPS_KEYSTORE} and ${KIE_SERVER_HTTPS_KEYSTORE} files used for serving secure content.

parameters.name: APPLICATION_NAME
parameters.description: The name for the application.

parameters.name: CREDENTIALS_SECRET
parameters.description: Secret containing the KIE_ADMIN_USER and KIE_ADMIN_PWD values.

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_CONTROLLER_TOKEN
parameters.description: KIE Server controller token for bearer authentication. (Sets the org.kie.server.controller.token system property)

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_BYPASS_AUTH_USER
parameters.description: Allows the KIE Server to bypass the authenticated user for task-related operations, for example, queries. (Sets the org.kie.server.bypass.auth.user system property)

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_MODE
parameters.description: The KIE Server mode. Valid values are 'DEVELOPMENT' or 'PRODUCTION'. In production mode, you can not deploy SNAPSHOT versions of artifacts on the KIE Server and can not change the version of an artifact in an existing container. (Sets the org.kie.server.mode system property).

parameters.name: KIE_MBEANS
parameters.description: KIE Server mbeans enabled/disabled. (Sets the kie.mbeans and kie.scanner.mbeans system properties)

parameters.name: DROOLS_SERVER_FILTER_CLASSES
parameters.description: KIE Server class filtering. (Sets the org.drools.server.filter.classes system property)

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_DECISIONS_ONLY
parameters.displayName: KIE Server with Decision only capabilities
parameters.description: KIE Server capabilities filtering to disable everything that it is not related to decisions (i.e jBPM and case management)

parameters.name: PROMETHEUS_SERVER_EXT_DISABLED
parameters.description: If set to false, the prometheus server extension will be enabled. (Sets the org.kie.prometheus.server.ext.disabled system property)

parameters.name: DECISION_CENTRAL_HOSTNAME_HTTP
parameters.displayName: Decision Central Custom http Route Hostname
parameters.description: Custom hostname for http service route for Decision Central.  Leave blank for default hostname, e.g.: insecure-<application-name>-rhdmcentr-<project>.<default-domain-suffix>

parameters.name: DECISION_CENTRAL_HOSTNAME_HTTPS
parameters.displayName: Decision Central Custom https Route Hostname
parameters.description: Custom hostname for https service route for Decision Central.  Leave blank for default hostname, e.g.: <application-name>-rhdmcentr-<project>.<default-domain-suffix>

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_HOSTNAME_HTTP
parameters.displayName: KIE Server Custom http Route Hostname
parameters.description: Custom hostname for http service route for KIE Server. Leave blank for default hostname, e.g.: insecure-<application-name>-kieserver-<project>.<default-domain-suffix>

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_HOSTNAME_HTTPS
parameters.displayName: KIE Server Custom https Route Hostname
parameters.description: Custom hostname for https service route for KIE Server. Leave blank for default hostname, e.g.: <application-name>-kieserver-<project>.<default-domain-suffix>

parameters.name: DECISION_CENTRAL_HTTPS_SECRET
parameters.displayName: Decision Central Server Keystore Secret Name
parameters.description: The name of the secret containing the keystore file for Decision Central.

parameters.name: DECISION_CENTRAL_HTTPS_KEYSTORE
parameters.description: The name of the keystore file within the secret for Decision Central.

parameters.name: DECISION_CENTRAL_HTTPS_NAME
parameters.description: The name associated with the server certificate for Decision Central.

parameters.name: DECISION_CENTRAL_HTTPS_PASSWORD
parameters.description: The password for the keystore and certificate for Decision Central.

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_HTTPS_SECRET
parameters.description: The name of the secret containing the keystore file for KIE Server.

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_HTTPS_KEYSTORE
parameters.description: The name of the keystore file within the secret for KIE Server.

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_HTTPS_NAME
parameters.description: The name associated with the server certificate for KIE Server.

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_HTTPS_PASSWORD
parameters.description: The password for the keystore and certificate for KIE Server.

parameters.name: APPFORMER_JMS_BROKER_PASSWORD

parameters.name: AMQ_NAME

parameters.description: Specifies the maximum amount of memory that message data can consume. If no value is specified, half of the systemâ€™s memory is allocated.

parameters.description: Size of persistent storage for AMQ broker volume.

parameters.name: AMQ_REPLICAS

parameters.name: DECISION_CENTRAL_CONTAINER_REPLICAS
parameters.description: Decision Central Container Replicas, defines how many Decision Central containers will be started.

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_CONTAINER_REPLICAS
parameters.description: KIE Server Container Replicas, defines how many KIE Server containers will be started.

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_CONTROLLER_OPENSHIFT_GLOBAL_DISCOVERY_ENABLED
parameters.description: If set to true, turns on KIE Server global discovery feature (Sets the org.kie.server.controller.openshift.global.discovery.enabled system property)

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_CONTROLLER_OPENSHIFT_PREFER_KIESERVER_SERVICE
parameters.description: If OpenShift integration of Business Central is turned on, setting this parameter to true enables connection to KIE Server via an OpenShift internal Service endpoint. (Sets the org.kie.server.controller.openshift.prefer.kieserver.service system property)

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_CONTROLLER_TEMPLATE_CACHE_TTL
parameters.description: KIE ServerTemplate Cache TTL in milliseconds. (Sets the org.kie.server.controller.template.cache.ttl system property)

parameters.name: IMAGE_STREAM_NAMESPACE
parameters.description: Namespace in which the ImageStreams for Red Hat Decision Manager images are installed. These ImageStreams are normally installed in the openshift namespace. You need to modify this parameter only if you installed the ImageStreams in a different namespace/project.

parameters.name: DECISION_CENTRAL_IMAGE_STREAM_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the image stream to use for Decision Central. Default is "rhpam-businesscentral-rhel8".

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_IMAGE_STREAM_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the image stream to use for KIE Server. Default is "rhpam-kieserver-rhel8".

parameters.name: IMAGE_STREAM_TAG
parameters.description: A named pointer to an image in an image stream. Default is "7.13.0".

parameters.name: MAVEN_MIRROR_URL
parameters.description: Maven mirror that Decision Central and KIE Server must use. If you configure a mirror, this mirror must contain all artifacts that are required for building and deploying your services.

parameters.name: MAVEN_MIRROR_OF
parameters.description: Maven mirror configuration for KIE Server.

parameters.name: MAVEN_REPO_ID
parameters.description: The id to use for the maven repository. If set, it can be excluded from the optionally configured mirror by adding it to MAVEN_MIRROR_OF. For example: external:*,!repo-rhdmcentr,!repo-custom. If MAVEN_MIRROR_URL is set but MAVEN_MIRROR_ID is not set, an id will be generated randomly, but won't be usable in MAVEN_MIRROR_OF.

parameters.name: MAVEN_REPO_URL
parameters.description: Fully qualified URL to a Maven repository or service.

parameters.name: MAVEN_REPO_USERNAME
parameters.description: User name for accessing the Maven repository, if required.

parameters.name: MAVEN_REPO_PASSWORD
parameters.description: Password to access the Maven repository, if required.

parameters.name: GIT_HOOKS_DIR
parameters.description: The directory to use for git hooks, if required.

parameters.name: DECISION_CENTRAL_VOLUME_CAPACITY
parameters.description: Size of the persistent storage for Decision Central's runtime data.

parameters.name: DECISION_CENTRAL_JAVA_MAX_MEM_RATIO
parameters.displayName: Decision Central Container JVM Max Memory Ratio
parameters.description: Decision Central Container JVM max memory ratio. -Xmx is set to a ratio of the memory available on the container. The default is 80, which means the upper boundary is 80% of the available memory. To skip adding the -Xmx option, set this value to 0.

parameters.name: DECISION_CENTRAL_CPU_REQUEST
parameters.description: Decision Central Container CPU request.

parameters.name: KIE_SERVER_CPU_LIMIT

parameters.description: KIE Server Container CPU Request.

parameters.description: RH-SSO Realm name.

parameters.description: KIE Server RH-SSO Client Secret.

parameters.name: SSO_DISABLE_SSL_CERTIFICATE_VALIDATION
parameters.description: RH-SSO Disable SSL Certificate Validation.

parameters.name: SSO_PRINCIPAL_ATTRIBUTE

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_URL
parameters.description: LDAP endpoint to connect for authentication. For failover, set two or more LDAP endpoints separated by space.

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_LOGIN_MODULE
parameters.description: LDAP login module flag, adds backward compatibility with the legacy security subsystem on Elytron. 'optional' is the only supported value, if set, it will create a distributed realm on Elytron configuration with LDAP and FileSystem realms with the user added using the KIE_ADMIN_USER.

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_LOGIN_FAILOVER
parameters.description: Enable failover, if LDAP Url is unreachable, it will fail over to the KieFsRealm.

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_BIND_DN
parameters.description: Bind DN used for authentication.

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_BIND_CREDENTIAL
parameters.description: LDAP Credentials used for authentication.

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_ALLOW_EMPTY_PASSWORDS
parameters.description: Does this realm support blank password direct verification? Blank password attempt will be rejected otherwise. Boolean flag, defaults to false.

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_BASE_CTX_DN
parameters.description: LDAP Base DN of the top-level context to begin the user search.

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_BASE_FILTER
parameters.description: LDAP search filter used to locate the context of the user to authenticate. The input username or userDN obtained from the login module callback is substituted into the filter anywhere a {0} expression is used. A common example for the search filter is (uid={0}).

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_RECURSIVE_SEARCH
parameters.description: Indicates if the user queries are recursive.

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_SEARCH_TIME_LIMIT
parameters.description: The timeout in milliseconds for user or role searches.

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_ROLE_ATTRIBUTE_ID
parameters.description: Name of the attribute containing the user roles.

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_ROLES_CTX_DN
parameters.description: The fixed DN of the context to search for user roles. This is not the DN where the actual roles are, but the DN where the objects containing the user roles are. For example, in a Microsoft Active Directory server, this is the DN where the user account is.

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_ROLE_FILTER
parameters.description: A search filter used to locate the roles associated with the authenticated user. The input username or userDN obtained from the login module callback is substituted into the filter anywhere a {0} expression is used. The authenticated userDN is substituted into the filter anywhere a {1} is used. An example search filter that matches on the input username is (member={0}). An alternative that matches on the authenticated userDN is (member={1}).

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_ROLE_RECURSION
parameters.description: The number of levels of recursion the role search will go below a matching context. Disable recursion by setting this to 0.

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_DEFAULT_ROLE
parameters.description: A role included for all authenticated users

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_NEW_IDENTITY_ATTRIBUTES
parameters.description: Provide new identities for LDAP  identity mapping, the pattern to be used with this env is 'attribute_name=attribute_value;another_attribute_name=value'

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_REFERRAL_MODE
parameters.description: If LDAP referrals should be followed. Corresponds to REFERRAL ('java.naming.referral') environment property. Allowed values: 'ignore', 'follow', 'throw'

parameters.name: AUTH_ROLE_MAPPER_ROLES_PROPERTIES
parameters.displayName: Role Mapping roles properties file path or one lined roles
parameters.description: When present, the RoleMapping will be configured to use the provided properties file or roles. This parameter defines the fully-qualified file path and name of a properties file or a set of roles with the following pattern 'role=role1;another-role=role2'. The format of every entry in the file is original_role=role1,role2,role3

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_MAPPER_KEEP_MAPPED
parameters.description: When set to 'true' the mapped roles will retain all roles, that have defined mappings. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: AUTH_LDAP_MAPPER_KEEP_NON_MAPPED
parameters.description: When set to 'true' the mapped roles will retain all roles, that have no defined mappings. Defaults to false.

parameters.name: APPFORMER_INFINISPAN_USERNAME
parameters.description: Username used for the Datagrid.

parameters.name: APPFORMER_INFINISPAN_PASSWORD
parameters.description: Password used for the Datagrid.
